CutSceneText.Text: What news from the Observatory? Do you think they suspect anything?
They pay no attention to us at all.
They think we're just ordinary sailors.
That's the way I want it.
A direct confrontation with the Guardians is the last thing we need.
Do you think we have enough bombs to destroy the Observatory?
These are no ordinary bombs--they came from the Abyss.
Then all we have to do is wait for the right time.
Ha-ha-ha-ha! Let's teach those fools in Sanctum a lesson they won't soon forget!
Ah, never mind, it's just a Plumis.
